IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: LINC EQUIPS CHILDREN WITH FOUNDATIONAL LITERACY SKILLS BY EMPOWERING FAMILIES AND COMMUNITIES.
IRS990.Desc: LINC MOBILIZED MORE THAN 153 COMMUNITY PARTNERS, INCLUDING LIBRARIES, TO DELIVER 159 READING EVERYWHERE PROGRAMS, 236 READING DISCOVERIES AND 171 PARENT WORKSHOP SESSIONS. WE ALSO GRADUATED 55 PARENTS IN OUR VERY INVOLVED PARENT (VIP) ACADEMY. NEARLY 62 VIPS VOLUNTEERED TO SUPPORT 121 EVENTS IN THE COMMUNITY.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE A, PART II, LINE 10, EXPLANATION OF OTHER INCOME:

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TEMPORARILY RESTRICTED NET ASSETS CONSIST OF CONTRIBUTIONS THAT ARE RESTRICTED BY THE DONOR FOR A SPECIFIC PROJECT OR PURPOSE OR RELATE TO FUTURE PERIODS. DURING MARCH 2023, THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS APPROVED THE ESTABLISHMENT OF A BOARD DESIGNATED FUND WHICH WAS FUNDED BY A $1,000,000 TRANSFER FROM UNDESIGNATED WITHOUT DONOR RESTRICTED FUNDS. THE PURPOSE OF THIS FUND IS TO ENABLE LINC TO UNDERTAKE PROJECTS NOT OTHERWISE SUPPORTED BY LINC'S REGULAR FUNDRAISING AND OTHER REVENUE-GENERATING ACTIVITIES, SUPPORT ESTABLISHED PROGRAM PRIORITIES, SUPPORT CAPITAL EXPENDITURES, HELP OFFSET OPERATING DEFICITS OR UNBUDGETED EXPENDITURES, AND SUPPORT OTHER PROGRAMS, ACTIVITIES AND OPERATIONS.

LITERACY INC. (LINC) IS AN AWARD-WINNING ORGANIZATION THAT PROVIDES EFFECTIVE EARLY LEARNING STRATEGIES FOR PARENTS TO BUILD A STRONG LITERACY FOUNDATION FOR THEIR CHILDREN DURING THEIR FIRST FIVE YEARS OF DEVELOPMENT, A TIME WHEN THEIR FUTURE OUTCOMES ARE SHAPED. OUR MISSION IS TO EQUIP CHILDREN WITH FOUNDATIONAL LITERACY SKILLS ESSENTIAL FOR ACADEMIC ACHIEVEMENT BY EMPOWERING FAMILIES AND MOBILIZING THE COMMUNITY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A DRAFT OF THE FORM 990 IS E-MAILED TO BOARD MEMBERS FOR COMMENT BEFORE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TO REGULARLY MONITOR AND ENFORCE COMPLIANCE WITH THE LINC'S CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, ANNUAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENTS ARE SIGNED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS CONDUCTS A YEARLY PERFORMANCE REVIEW OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND SETS THE SALARY FOR THE NEW YEAR. THIS IS DONE IN SEPTEMBER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: LINC MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST. FINANCE HAS A GOOGLE DRIVE LOCATION FOR ALL POLICIES , HANDBOOKS AND PROCESS MEMOS. THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE ON THE LINC WEBSITE.

PROFESSIONAL FEES: PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES 271,754. MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES 46,002. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 0. TOTAL EXPENSES 317,756.
